textBeforeTable: 4x4 Short course A-main Video Reported by Chad Bradley - Saturday July 16th Hot Rod Raceway Pro 4wd SC - Hot Rod Hobbies Tuesday Night Nationals with 90 entries Tuesday night. In the Pro 4 Short Course Truck Class Chad Bradley with the new Nexx 10SC TQed round 2 of qualifying setting a time that beat out Stephen Bess's round 1 time, Bess ended up qualifying in the second spot. In the main event Chad pulled to an early lead and never looked back, Chad lead every lap of the main event to take the convincing win in the Pro 4 Short Course Class. Chad said the truck has been very fast and easy to drive, Bess 2nd  and Suarez rounded out the top 3! davegm Chad wins again with his Nexx10sc 4x4 - 7/19/11 by  8  Tony Neuaman  3rd  Hyper 9  Brian Bourland  2nd  Hyper 9  Jubal Dike  1st      Electric Buggy  8  Jose Rocillo  3rd  408
